pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"CocoaPods 是一个 Cocoa 和 Cocoa Touch 框架的依赖管理器，具体原理和 Homebrew 有点类似，都是从 GitHub 下载索引，然后根据索引下载依赖的源代码。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"对于旧版的 CocoaPods 可以使用如下方法使用镜像："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"pod repo remove master
pod repo add master {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/Specs.git
pod repo update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新版的 CocoaPods 不允许用",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pod repo add"}],"直接添加 master 库了，但是依然可以："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"cd ~/.cocoapods/repos
pod repo remove master
git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/Specs.git master","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["最后进入自己的工程，在自己工程的",["$r","code",null,{"children":"podFile"}],"第一行加上："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"source '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/Specs.git'"}]]}]

meta.title: CocoaPods 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
